title: It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.
text: We work based on a multi-stakeholder approach with local partners both from civil society, government and private sector, based on mutual respect and with consideration for our partners’ autonomy.

title: Your donation can give children happy childhoods they deserve.
text: We work based on a multi-stakeholder approach with local partners both from civil society, government and private sector, based on mutual respect and with consideration for our partners’ autonomy.
